column5: Planning to buy an power ice auger this month. I primarily fish for perch/walleye. Something light-weighted would be nice. I've only been looking through Lebaron catalogue, and Basspro flier.  These are my options, but Iâ€™m opened for suggestions:  (I don't need the best)  http://www.lebaron.ca/pdf_fall_07/icefishi...iffy_eskimo.pdf http://www.basspro.com/webapp/wcs/stores/s...mp;pageNumber=2
the strikemaster from basspro is a good deal 299.99

I've had an Eskimo for around 5 years and it has been good to me for the most part.  Only issue I've had was in extreme cold (-30 temps we had a few winters ago) I could not get it to start.  Guys with Jiffy's around me were able to fire their's up.  When the sun came up and things improved a few degrees I was able to get it going (luckily the Jiffy boys had already drilled a few holes for me)

Jiffy's worth every penny  Don't see too many operators up north using anything else.  That being said my buddy bought the 8" Strikemaster at BPS - Gonna give that one a work out this year  We always have the 6" normark manual as back up

Only time my jiffy hasn't started was when it was out of gas. I haven't even changed the plugs or anything in it. Put gas in, prime it, pull it, drill holes......its really that easy. I've got a newer 2hp with the 9" blade as well, and it runs great, but seems to take a couple minutes to warm up. The model 30 with the 10" bit is kick ass.  Sinker
Wallmart has the Jiffy 30 9" for $419.00.Thats not a bad price for one of those.

just to let you know  if you know anyone with a costco membership they have a eskimo 3 hp 8 inch power auger for $249.00  not a bad deal  they are down the aisle against the wall were the automotive stiff is same wall they keep fridges freezers etc.. on
I have the 2hrs strikemaster 8", love the auger 63 holes per tank!!!, it goes threw ice like a champ!!
thanks for everyone's input. Skeeter, which Costco are you talking about? When was the last time you seen it? 3hp under 300 sounds like a gd deal.
at the costco in ajax  but pretty much all of them have em, it is just how many make some calls to the stores nearest you  oh forgot it was about a week and a half ago
